#summary Camera Control System functions


      // Chase Camera Mode
GMFN double SetChaseCameraModeRelativePosition(double camera_mode_ptr, double relative_posx, double relative_posz, double relative_posy)
GMFN double SetChaseCameraModeTightness(double camera_mode_ptr, double tightness)
GMFN double EnableChaseCameraModeFixedYawAxis(double camera_mode_ptr, double enable, double axisx, double axisz, double axisy)
GMFN double EnableChaseCameraModeCollisions(double camera_mode_ptr, double enable)

	// Chase Free Yaw Axis Camera Mode
GMFN double SetChaseFreeYawAxisCameraModeRelativePosition(double camera_mode_ptr, double relative_posx, double relative_posz, double relative_posy, double offset_yaw, double offset_pitch, double offset_roll)
GMFN double SetChaseFreeYawAxisCameraModeTightness(double camera_mode_ptr, double tightness)
GMFN double EnableChaseFreeYawAxisCameraModeCollisions(double camera_mode_ptr, double enable)

	// Orbital Camera Mode
GMFN double SetOrbitalCameraModeRotationFactor(double camera_mode_ptr, double degrees_per_second)
GMFN double SetOrbitalCameraModeZoomFactor(double camera_mode_ptr, double units_per_second)
GMFN double SetOrbitalCameraModeZoom(double camera_mode_ptr, double zoom)
GMFN double ZoomOrbitalCameraMode(double camera_mode_ptr, double percentage)
GMFN double SetOrbitalCameraModeYaw(double camera_mode_ptr, double degrees)
GMFN double YawOrbitalCameraMode(double camera_mode_ptr, double percentage)
GMFN double SetOrbitalCameraModePitch(double camera_mode_ptr, double degrees)
GMFN double PitchOrbitalCameraMode(double camera_mode_ptr, double percentage)
GMFN double SetOrbitalCameraModeRelativePosition(double camera_mode_ptr, double relative_posx, double relative_posz, double relative_posy, double offset_yaw, double offset_pitch, double offset_roll)
GMFN double SetOrbitalCameraModeTightness(double camera_mode_ptr, double tightness)
GMFN double EnableOrbitalCameraModeCollisions(double camera_mode_ptr, double enable)

	// First Person Camera Mode
GMFN double ShowFirstPersonCameraModeCharacter(double camera_mode_ptr)
GMFN double HideFirstPersonCameraModeCharacter(double camera_mode_ptr)

	// Fixed Direction Camera Mode
GMFN double SetFixedDirectionCameraModeTightness(double camera_mode_ptr, double tightness)
GMFN double SetFixedDirectionCameraModeDirection(double camera_mode_ptr, double x, double z, double y)
GMFN double SetFixedDirectionCameraModeDistance(double camera_mode_ptr, double distance)

	// Plane Binded Camera Mode
GMFN double SetPlaneBindedCameraModeTightness(double camera_mode_ptr, double tightness)

	// Fixed Camera Mode
GMFN double SetFixedCameraModePosition(double camera_mode_ptr, double x, double z, double y)
GMFN double SetFixedCameraModeOrientation(double camera_mode_ptr, double yaw, double pitch, double roll)

	// Fixed Tracking Camera Mode
GMFN double SetFixedTrackingCameraModePosition(double camera_mode_ptr, double x, double z, double y)
GMFN double SetFixedTrackingCameraModeOrientation(double camera_mode_ptr, double yaw, double pitch, double roll)

	// Closest To Target Camera Mode
GMFN double AddClosestToTargetCameraModePosition(double camera_mode_ptr, double x, double z, double y)

	// Free Camera Mode
GMFN double SetFreeCameraModeMoveFactor(double camera_mode_ptr, double units_per_sec)
GMFN double SetFreeCameraModeRotationFactor(double camera_mode_ptr, double units_per_sec)
GMFN double YawFreeCameraMode(double camera_mode_ptr, double delta)
GMFN double PitchFreeCameraMode(double camera_mode_ptr, double delta)
GMFN double MoveFreeCameraModeLeft(double camera_mode_ptr, double percentage)
GMFN double MoveFreeCameraModeRight(double camera_mode_ptr, double percentage)
GMFN double MoveFreeCameraModeForward(double camera_mode_ptr, double percentage)
GMFN double MoveFreeCameraModeBackward(double camera_mode_ptr, double percentage)
GMFN double MoveFreeCameraModeUp(double camera_mode_ptr, double percentage)
GMFN double MoveFreeCameraModeDown(double camera_mode_ptr, double percentage)
